alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 5:11AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lackawanna, northeastern Luzerne and southeastern Wyoming Counties through 545 AM EDT... At 511 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Penobscot, or near Wilkes-Barre, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Dunmore, Kingston, Nanticoke, Plains, Old Forge, Pittston, Archbald and Blakely. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 164 and 197. Interstate 84 between 1 and 4. Interstate 380 between 20 and 24. Interstate 476 between 105 and 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
